comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: 10 October 1943: CAPT Ernest B. McMann's 'Honey Baby' (P-47D serial 42-74720, coded HO-T) of the 487th Fighter Squadron, 352nd FG was in the hands of LT Clarence J. Palmer when he ran out of gas - conveniently - over the field, and made this forced landing at Bodney. With minimal damage, the aircraft was returned to service and eventually found its way into a the 552nd Fighter Training Squadron (re-coded DQ-T).
